data.message: Well I'm so excited Eminem you have made my beautiful boy so happy! He's been a big fan for years and he adores you! So I surprised him with Leeds festival tickets just to see you! It's his first festival and a memory he will keep forever! He cannot believe it he said" mum I can't believe it! I'm going to see my idol! " he probably won't get to see u all that well due to the crowds but he's not bothered he said as long as he can hear you and know your there it's ok" that's what makes my little boy so special it's just the things he says! Thanku for making his dreams come true! Xxx

replies.message: I know he's only 12 and so amazing! He's so excited we just love him! 😊Xx

Hi Maria, a similar story for my son when I took him to see Eminem at Reading 2013 for his 15th birthday.  It is, and will always be one of his best memories of his lifetime I'm sure.  At the time I told my son 'Dreams do come true
..'  😁

Hi! My son is nearly 13 so a little younger! He loves the fact he understands his messages through music he always talks about how his life hasn't been easy and he loves how much he loves his children and was determined to make a better life for his family. My son sees him as an inspiration and Jenson has not had his dad in his life since the age of 4 but he still remains grounded, happy and gold hearted! So he deserved this treat and we both can't wAit! Is your son going again? X
